itemDescription: English rugby league and rugby union footballer

wikipedia_page.main:
Dominic Peters (born 11 December 1978 in Acton) is an English rugby league footballer.
Peters played for the London Broncos in the Super League. He has also played for the London Skolars. Dom Peters has also played for London Wasps.Dominic Peters' position of choice was as a wing. He could also operate in the second-row.
